$Log(Y_{i,t}) = \beta_1 (Toilet^{pre}_{i})*Post_t + \alpha_i + \gamma_t + \epsilon_{i,t}$


$\alpha_i$ : state fixed effects

$\gamma_t$ : year fixed effects

$Y_{i,t} = \beta_1 Toilet^{pre}_{i}*Post_t + \alpha_i + \gamma_t + \delta_i+ \epsilon_{i,t}$

$Y_{i,t} = \displaystyle\sum_{-3,\tau \neq -1}^{5} \beta_{\tau}(Toilet^{pre}_{i})*T_{t+\tau} + \alpha_i + \gamma_t + \delta_i+  \epsilon_{i,t}$

$Y_{i,t} = \beta_1 D_{i,t} + \beta_2 D_{i,t} *SocialNorm_i + \alpha_i + \gamma_t + \delta_i+ \epsilon_{i,t}$

Where $D_{i,t}$ = $Toilet^{pre}_{i}*Post_t$

$Y_{i,t} = \beta_1 D_{i,t} + \beta_2 D_{i,t} *Marriage_i + \alpha_i + \gamma_t + \delta_i+ \epsilon_{i,t}$

Where $D_{i,t}$ = $Toilet^{pre}_{i}*Post_t$
